Articles.Content:
Just playing around with ways to do swing wing craft.

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/LZs9hewu99k" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
wow that's really cool! But is it useful in any way to be able to move the wings like that?

a slight change in flight characteristics as the control surfaces now tilt in slightly different directions and the center of gravity is moved back a bit. I don't believe that it effects aerodynamics at all.
That's cool, I liked how you added that little "Oops" on the landing
